name: Project Fog: The Wounded
description:
A birth of another PSX survival horror game that will bring you back to the 90s era of old school horror games.

Play the character of Cheryl who got trapped in a mysterious foggy city.  Wounded, she barely managed to enter an establishment to escape from the monster. She was then greeted by a man named Norman who rushed and killed the monster chasing after her. Norman tended Cheryl's wound after and left her some supplies to survive. The clock is ticking for Norman as someone dear to him is missing, and soon he'll have to leave Cheryl alone.

This Game is made for the Jam called SCREAMSONIC with a theme "Good Vibes/Bad Vibes" It is a 1 week long game jam so don't expect for a long gameplay. You can finish the game for 15-25minutes depending on how you explore.

Consider this game as a demo for the Main Game I'm developing. I have built systems to make fix angle survival horror games and those core systems will be reused when there is a need to develop new horror games like this.

Follow Me: https://twitter.com/SolodevI

Support the development to unlock every day updates and behind the scenes: https://www.patreon.com/solodevinteractive

Note that the game doesn't support gamepad.. yet.

W,A,S,DMove/RotateSpace/EnterInteractL Shift (Hold)RunRight Click (Hold)Ready / AimLeft ClickFire Weapon / Swing Melee (While aiming/ready)TabToggle InventoryPPause Game
